price: 90. Hadduu ka mid yahay kuwa ah gacanta midig (ehlu Jannada).
arabic: وَأَمَّآ إِن كَانَ مِنۡ أَصۡحَٰبِ ٱلۡيَمِينِ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-ammā in kāna min aṣḥābi al-yamīni
